Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases where the next activity is Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases successfully concluding with Payment Handled
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION across all cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION for cases with Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR compared to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to the next activity in the process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time it takes for cases with Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to reach Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment in cases exceeding the average processing time
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION Cycle Time in comparison to cycle time of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in the most frequent variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
